de.codecrafters.tableview

Class TableView<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableView<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortableTableView

    public class TableView<T>
extends LinearLayout
    A view that is able to display data as a table. For bringing the data to the view the TableDataAdapter can be used. For formatting the table headers the TableHeaderAdapter can be used.
    Author:
    ISchwarz

      Sets the TableDataAdapter that is used to render the data view for each cell.

      Sets the given TableDataRowColoriser that will be used to define the background color for every table data row.

      • setHeaderElevation

        public void setHeaderElevation(int elevation)
        Sets the elevation level of the header view. If you are not able to see the elevation shadow you should set a background(-color) to the header.
        Parameters:
        elevation - The elevation that shall be set to the table header.

      • setDataRowColoriser

        public void setColumnWeight(int columnIndex,
                   int columnWeight)

        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column the weight should be set to.
        columnWeight - The weight that should be set to the column.

      • getColumnWeight

        public int getColumnWeight(int columnIndex)
        Gives the column weight (the relative width of the column) of the given column.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The weight of the given column index.
